forecast.day_comments: Snow, freezing rain, and sleet before 2am, then snow and sleet between 2am and 3am, then snow, possibly mixed with freezing rain after 3am.  Low around 30. South wind 8 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.  Total nighttime snow and sleet accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow likely before 9am, then a chance of rain and snow between 9am and 10am, then a slight chance of snow after 10am.  Cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly sunny, with a high near 35. South wind 5 to 8 mph becoming west in the afternoon.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
